title: Draven Head Overrides ...
body:
is there a setting to where we can turn them off ingame? I dont want to play ranked to have them removed

Im pretty sure im not the only one. (especially people who have just bought a skin and have to deal with this stuff lol)

replies.body: Trust me, I have had people who haven't played ranked feeding and making people angry because they just don't want the heads. This is starting to cause issues. Also it didn't go down at midnight so I guess we have to wait a little longer.
This irritates me... I currently am refusing to play league at the moment due to the Draven head override... RIOT, it's all good and fun for a day, but can you turn it off now?

Just found a post from RIOT stating that the Draven heads are on until the 4th.

> From now until April 4, at 16:59 AEST

[Click Here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/draven-day-2016) to read more about it

Lol it's funny how Riot wants to introduce a new system for URF later on in the year, for only 4 days in total, and replace it with last minute photoshop Draven heads. Pretty cool idea, but Draven heads are funny the first game you play, then they just start getting annoying. And I'm a Draven main for League's sake.

Like seriously, whoever is incharge over there must not like the community. All it takes for Riot to get free money is URF. But they cancel it for something which looks like it was coded in 15 minutes before April, and everyone gets sick of it after about 5 games.

The whole Draven concept is cool... and the skins are pretty dope... but it just can't compare to URF. I'm hoping Draven's party on the 4th isn't a bust, because right now let's be honest...

It's pretty lame.
{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}

I just typed this comment on another thread:

"This has been the most stupid event I have ever seen in any video game I have ever played. It got so annoying in the matches I played yesterday that I just logged off mid game. Told my team mates before hand. Sure I was reported, when I logged on I get the LeaveBuster Warning that I need to write "I agree" not to quit or go afk. I will wait till after its over before I do the acknowledgement. Im not going to play LoL whilst its on anyway so there is no point typing "I accept" because if I start a game and there are Draven bobble heads I will just quit again."

I don't care if Riot want to suspend my account for going afk. You put stupid/lame things in such as these Draven bobble heads then I just wont play LoL till its gone. If it pops up during a game randomly, give me a button to turn it off, if not then I am quitting.

Last until he 4th? Nice..I am not playing LoL till after then.
